description: In Thimbleweed Park, a dead body is the least of your problems. Switch between five playable characters to uncover the surreal secrets of this strange town in a modern mystery adventure game from the creators of Monkey Island and Maniac Mansion. The deeper you go, the weirder it gets.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (fully, FULLY patched) Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 3000 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
